knimeNode.name: String To URI
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert a string column into an URI column.

fullDescription.intro: This node converts the selected string column into a column of the type URI.
fullDescription.option: Column that will be converted. It has to contain a string with the correct URI syntax.
If enabled file pathes will be converted to a correct URI (with the scheme "file" appended to the front).
Checks if the files referenced by the created URIs are existing and will abort if one is not.
Does append the URI column to the table instead of replacing the selected column.

ports.inPort: Table that contains a string column with URI information.
ports.outPort: Input table with the corresponding URI column to the selected column. It will either be appended or replacing the old column, depending on the configuration.
